title: Vehicle Service Reset Oil
description:
So you have finished servicing your own vehicle but now your stuck with that ugly 'Service Now' message or light. Not any more, in a matter of seconds easily look-up the reset procedure for any vehicle you are working on.
It's as easy as 1,2,3.
1. Choose vehicle manufacturer from the 50+ makes listed.
2. Select the vehicle model.
3. Select the year of manufacture.
Unrivalled vehicle support including European brands like Vauxhall, Peugeot, Citroen etc.
2016 vehicle support.
Once installed does not require Internet access so even works at the back of your garage.
New vehicle reset procedures added as soon as they become available without re-installing the app.
Share facility - share the reset procedure by SMS, eMail or Social Media.

So you have finished servicing your own vehicle but now your stuck with that ugly 'Service Now' message or light. Not any more, in a matter of seconds easily look-up the reset procedure for any vehicle you are working on.

It's as easy as 1,2,3.

1. Choose vehicle manufacturer from the 50+ makes listed.
2. Select the vehicle model.
3. Select the year of manufacture.

Unrivalled vehicle support including European brands like Vauxhall, Peugeot, Citroen etc.

Once installed does not require Internet access so even works at the back of your garage.
